body: This Medium dog is bred for carrying Small riders, and is combat trained. Breeders select dogs with strong backs, endurance, and loyal dispositions and train them for riding and combat before sale. Reputable breeders can be found in major cities.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Gear/Animals/Mounts/and Related Gear/Animals/Mounts/and Related Gear/Dog/Riding Dog
name: Riding Dog
